doc.title: Hougang Six Mile Muah Chee: Ultimate Muah Chee!
doc.text: When/WRB I/PRP asked/VBD Mr/NN Teo/NN ,/, the/DT Muah/NN Chee/NN man/NN who/WP is/VBZ still/RB making/VBG his/PRP$ dish/NN by/IN hand/NN to/TO take/VB part/NN in/IN the/DT Ultimate/NNP Hawker/NNP Fest/NNP ,/, he/PRP told/VBD me/PRP that/WDT he/PRP will/VB get/VB back/RB to/TO me/PRP on/IN it/PRP ./. I/PRP had/VBD n't/RB heard/VBN from/IN him/PRP after/IN a/DT month/NN ,/, so/RB I/PRP thought/VBD that/IN he/PRP was/VBD n't/RB too/RB keen/JJ to/TO take/VB part/NN in/IN the/DT festival/NN ./. For/IN most/NN of/IN the/DT hawkers/NNS ,/, taking/VBG part/NN in/IN the/DT festival/JJ means/NN that/IN they/PRP have/VBP to/TO close/VB their/PRP$ stall/NN for/IN a/DT day/NN and/CC that/WDT means/VBZ the/DT loss/NN of/IN one/CD day/NN 's/POS income/NN which/WDT is/VBZ a/DT lot/NN to/TO ask/VB ./. All/PDT of/IN the/DT hawkers/NNS that/WDT are/VBP participating/VBN in/IN the/DT event/NNS are/VBP doing/VBG it/PRP for/IN charity/NN ./. Some/DT of/IN them/PRP are/VBP not/RB only/RB donating/VB their/PRP$ time/NN ,/, they/PRP are/VBP also/RB paying/NN for/IN all/DT the/DT raw/JJ ingredients/NNS !/. Others/NNS are/VBP reimbursed/JJ for/IN the/DT raw/JJ ingredients/NNS only/RB ./. I/PRP always/RB remember/VB the/DT biblical/JJ story/NN of/IN the/DT poor/JJ old/JJ lady/NN who/WP gave/VBD 2/CD copper/NNS coins/RB ./. Compared/JJ to/TO the/DT rich/JJ pharisees/NN who/WP gave/VBD sack/NN loads/NN of/IN money/NN ,/, we/PRP are/VBP told/JJ that/IN Jesus/NN commended/IN the/DT old/JJ lady/NN because/IN she/PRP had/VBD given/VBN out/RP of/IN the/DT little/JJ that/WDT she/PRP had/VBD ./. I/PRP feel/VB a/DT sense/NN of/IN gratitude/NN and/CC pride/NN for/IN out/JJ hawkers/NNS who/WP are/VBP giving/VBG what/WP they/PRP can/MD to/TO support/VB our/PRP$ Charity/JJ event/NN ./. Anyway/RB ,/, back/RB to/TO Mr/NNP Teo/NNP ./. He/PRP finally/RB called/VBD me/PRP 2/CD weeks/NNS before/IN the/DT event/NN and/CC apologized/NN that/WDT he/PRP had/VBD not/RB gotten/VB back/RB to/TO me/PRP because/IN he/PRP had/VBD been/VBN hospitalized/VBG for/IN 2/CD weeks/NN with/IN jaundice/NN ,/, so/RB he/PRP was/VBD n't/RB sure/VB if/IN he/PRP could/MD make/VB it/PRP to/TO the/DT event/NN !/. The/DT good/JJ news/NN is/VBZ that/RB now/RB he/PRP has/VBZ recovered/NN and/CC will/VB be/VB making/VBG his/PRP$ famous/JJ Muah/NN Chee/NN at/IN the/DT Ultimate/NNP Hawker/NNP Fest/NNP !/. Just/RB what/WP is/VBZ he/PRP going/NN to/TO do/VB to/TO make/VB his/PRP$ Muah/JJ Chee/NN worth/NN $/$ 5/CD ?/. Well/RB ,/, this/DT one/CD is/VBZ a/DT secret/NN ,/, but/CC he/PRP is/VBZ going/NN to/TO add/VB some/DT extra/JJ ingredients/NNS to/TO the/DT ground/JJ peanuts/NNS !/. We/PRP 'll/VB just/RB have/VBN to/TO wait/VB to/TO experience/NN it/PRP at/IN the/DT Ultimate/NNP Hawker/NNP Fest/NNP this/DT Saturday/NN !/. See/VB you/PRP there/RB !/. To/PRP buy/VB tickets/VB to/TO the/DT Ultimate/NNP Hawker/NNP Fest/NNP ,/, please/NNP visit/NN http://www.touch.org.sg/ultimatehawkerfest2012Â /NN Venue/NN :/: Millenia/NNP Walk/NNP Date/NNP :/: 20/CD Oct/NNP 2012/NNP Time/NNP :/: 5pm/NNP to/TO 10pm/VB Tickets/RB now/RB on/IN sale/NN at/IN Millenia/NN Walk/NN and/CC will/VB also/RB be/VB on/IN sale/NN on/IN the/DT day/NN of/IN the/DT festival/NN
